name: A dimly glowing toxin infused amulet
data: It decreases the users strength strongly.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom strongly.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It increases the users charisma adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration magnificently.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users poison resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
